daily_activities: Arrival in Malé, check-in to hotel, and explore the city
Visit the Grand Friday Mosque, Malé Fish Market, and National Museum
Take a ferry to Villingili Island for sightseeing and relaxation
Explore the beaches and crystal-clear waters of Villingili Island
Take a day trip to the nearby island of Hulhumalé for sightseeing
Visit the HP Reef, a popular spot for snorkeling and diving
Relax on the beautiful beaches of Nalaguraidhoo Island
Take a sunset cruise around the atolls
Visit the local villages and experience the Maldivian culture
Go on a sightseeing tour of the island of Thulusdhoo
Explore the coral reefs and marine life of the Maldives
Take a day trip to the island of Himmafushi for sightseeing
Visit the Utheemu Ganduvaru, a historic site and museum
Relax on the beach or by the pool at the hotel

travel_instructions.route_details: From Ahmedabad, take a flight from Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel International Airport (AMD) to Velana International Airport (MLE) in Malé, Maldives. Various airlines such as IndiGo, SpiceJet, and SriLankan Airlines operate direct or connecting flights.
